  • Constructor Details

    • Ball

      public Ball​(int posX, int posY, double velocityX, double velocityY, int width, int height, boolean isMoving, boolean isSticked)
      Constructor for ball that does not start sticked to the paddle
      Parameters:
      posX - initial position X
      posY - initial position Y
      velocityX - initial velocity X
      velocityY - initial velocity Y
      width - Ball width
      height - Ball height
      isMoving - is an moving object
      isSticked - is sticked to paddle

    • Ball

      public Ball​(int paddleX, int paddleY, int paddleWidth)
      Another constructor that sets ball's coordinates according to paddle's coordinates
      Parameters:
      paddleX - paddle's X position
      paddleY - paddle's Y position
      paddleWidth - paddle's width

  • Method Details

    • move

      public void move()
      Move function of ball, updates the x and Y coordinates of ball according to current velocity. If the ball is sticked to paddle, updates the x and y coordinates according to the paddle position.
      Overrides:
      move in class domain.PhysicalObject

    • checkVelocity

      public void checkVelocity()
      threshold function for for velocityX and velocityY. If their magnitude is greater than 10,sets their magnitude to 10.

    • isFire

      public boolean isFire()

    • setFire

      public void setFire​(boolean isFire)
      Setter for isFire, if sets isFire value to true, directly makes isChemical value false.
      Parameters:
      isFire - boolean value for setting isFire either true or false

    • isChemical

      public boolean isChemical()

    • setChemical

      public void setChemical​(boolean isChemical)
      Setter for isChemical, if sets isChemical value to true, directly makes isFire value false.
      Parameters:
      isChemical - boolean value for setting isChemical either true or false

    • isSticked

      public boolean isSticked()

    • setSticked

      public void setSticked​(boolean isSticked)
      Setter for isSticked,If isSticked parameter is false, updates ball's velocityX and velocityY values.
      Parameters:
      isSticked - boolean value for setting isSticked either true or false
